Trade/Device Name(s): Dade Behring LabPro AlertEx Software System
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Device
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): LabPro Data Management System Software version 3.0
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dade Behring LabPro AlertEx Software System, a rule-based software for alerting users to unusual conditions and enabling changes to organism identification and AST interpretation in microbiology diagnostics.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to notify users of unusual conditions or out-of-range results and/or provide ability to change organism identifications and antibiotic susceptibility test interpretations when used with LabPro Data Management System Software and MicroScan Instruments.
